title: Investment Analyst II at Cameron Craig Group (Cleveland, OH)
text: Source: Glassdoor The Investment Analyst will support a team of Senior Analysts that provides strategic input regarding existing and new opportunities for the internal asset management portfolio. The analyst will research marketable asset classes, implement/execute trades for new and existing strategies, develop quantitative models and draft/write research reports for the Senior Analyst team. The ideal candidate for this position will have 3-7 years of investment or investment industry experience, a quantitative background and a strong interest in developing and testing models and researching capital market and institutional investing opportunities. The Investment Analyst must be able to work independently and be comfortable in an open, collegial environment that will challenge and foster growth. Responsibilities * Conduct research for Senior Investment Analysts. * Develop detailed models used to back test and implement investment strategies related to equities, options, credits and volatility. * Support team preparation of monthly/quarterly capital market dashboards. * Work with the legal team to review and complete paperwork related to new investment relationships and strategies. * Maintain internal interdepartmental relationships and external trade counterparty relationships. * Work with compliance/investment operations to ensure risk management procedures and controls are being followed. * Implement/execute trades for new and existing strategies. Specific Work Experience and Background Desired * Bachelorâ€™s Degree with high university GPA. * Minimum of 3 years work experience with experience in financial/quantitative modeling. * An advanced degree and/or investment industry designations are a plus (i.e. CAIA, CFA). Other Desirable Attributes * High level of self-motivation and initiative * Proven analytical and quantitative skills * Strong interpersonal skills. * Strong written and verbal communication skills. * Excellent MS Excel aptitude.
